articles.description: Celtic and Rangers meet at Ibrox on Sunday amid the closest title race in Scotland for well over a decade.
articles.title: Old Firm poised for title showdown at Ibrox

articles.description: Manchester United manager Erik ten Hag says his players will be "angry" when they face Liverpool and has called on them to "bring big games over the line".
articles.title: Man Utd will be 'angry' against Liverpool - Ten Hag

articles.description: Arsenal maintained their pursuit of a first Premier League title for 20 years as they moved top of the table with an impressive away victory over Brighton.
articles.title: Arsenal beat Brighton to move top of Premier League

articles.description: Aston Villa forward Ollie Watkins says his side lack "a big-team mentality" to kill off crucial games in the Premier League.
articles.title: Villa lack 'big-team mentality' - Watkins

articles.description: Brendan Rodgers' Old Firm record is better than any other manager. But Sunday's meeting with Rangers could be his toughest yet, writes Tom English.
articles.title: Why Rodgers' 16th derby holds more peril than any other

articles.description: Find out more about Caitlin Clark the new superstar of US sport who is breaking records on and off the basketball court.
articles.title: Caitlin Clark: The young superstar who will captivate the US this weekend

articles.description: Moving the Japanese Grand Prix from autumn to April has painted it with the country's famous cherry blossom, but otherwise it has been business as usual.
articles.title: Japanese Grand Prix 2024: 'Max Verstappen returns to power, but are Mercedes blossoming?'

articles.description: Lindsey Horan converts a 77th-minute penalty to give the United States a 2-1 win over Japan and send them into the final of the SheBelieves Cup.
articles.title: Horan penalty sends USA into SheBelieves Cup final

articles.description: Watch as New York Mets third base Brett Baty takes a stunning diving catch as the New York Mets beat the Cincinnati Reds 3-2.
articles.title: 'What a play!' Mets star takes stunning catch

articles.description: Find out the in depth batting and bowling figures for New Zealand Women v England Women in the Women's One Day International Series on BBC Sport.
articles.title: New Zealand Women v England Women - Cricket - BBC Sport
